title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.4 - Care of the flag
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.4 - Care of the flag

State Regulations

Children should be taught to take proper care of the flag. Once a week it should be brushed with a soft brush. At the weekend and prior to
any vacation period, it should be brushed, folded around the pole and properly
covered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
108.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
